bibl.title: Greek Magic. Ancient, Medieval and Modern. (Routledge Monographs in Classical Studies.)
bibl.note: 25 contributions, originally published in four successive special issues on magic (December 1999 - December 2000) in the trimonthly Greek journal, Archaiologia kai Technes. - Pp. xi: J.C.B.P., Prologue; - 179-188: Bibliography; - 189-196: Index.
bibl.seg: PETROPOULOS J.C.B. (Ed.), Greek Magic. Ancient, Medieval and Modern. (Routledge Monographs in Classical Studies.)
Abingdon, Routledge, 2008, 8°, xii-196 pp., 10 figg. ISBN 978-0-415-28232-1. £60.

25 contributions, originally published in four successive special issues on magic (December 1999 - December 2000) in the trimonthly Greek journal, Archaiologia kai Technes. - Pp. xi: J.C.B.P., Prologue; - 179-188: Bibliography; - 189-196: Index.
C.R. par Patrice Cauderlier, Latomus 69 (2010) pp. 529-531. - Marguerite Johnson, CR N.S., 60 (2010) pp. 187-189.
